summary: VOLKSWAGEN VEHICLE IS UNSAFE BECAUSE IGNITION COILS ON 4,6,8 CYL. ENGINES MAY FAIL AT ANY TIME, CAUSING CAR TO LIMP ALONG ON REDUCED POWER IN POSSIBLY PERILOUS TRAFFIC CONDITIONS.  VW REFUSES TO TAKE PROACTIVE MEASURES TO CORRECT THE PROBLEM AND AVOID POSSIBLE LIFE-THREATENING SITUATIONS.  I BEG YOU, FORCE THEM TO DO A RECALL.
